stimulusHtml:
Reaction 1:    4 NH3(g) + 5 O2(g) → 4 NO(g) + 6 H2O(l)              ΔG° = -1010 kJ/molrxn

Reaction 2:    2 NO2(g) → 2 NO(g) + O2(g)                                     ΔG° =       70 kJ/molrxn

Reaction 3:    4 NO2(g) + O2(g) + 2 H2O(l) → 4 HNO3(aq)           ΔG° =   -170 kJ/molrxn

 

Based on the values of ΔG° for the three reactions represented above, what is the value of ΔG° for the reaction represented below?

4 NH3(g) + 8 O2(g) → 4 HNO3(aq) + 4 H2O(l)
